subject: Pedals are no longer detected by the system.
description_text:
Hello! I updated the firmware to version 2.1.2 and my pedals are no longer
detected.

The update process went like this: First, I tried updating the software
through the app itself. However, after downloading and updating, my
interface became glitchy and transparent. I had to restart the app. This
had happened before, but this time, the software didn't update and the
version remained the same. Then I downloaded the new SIMSONN
Manager-2.1.2-Setup.zip driver from the official website. I unzipped the
archive and launched the application from the new archive. After that, the
USB connection disappeared.

When the cable is disconnected and reconnected, the LED backlight lights up
for a few seconds and Windows plays a sound notification indicating the
device is connected. The device is detected in Task Manager. However, the
software shows that the pedals are still disabled. In Windows devices, the
pedals are working in the Axes properties, and there is movement of the
axes when pressing the pedals. Windows also correctly displays the device
as a gaming device.
Pressing the update button on the pedals turns on the red backlight, and
the program displays that the button is enabled. (Screenshot attached.)
I tried installing software versions 2.0.9, 2.1.0, but the situation does
not change.

To test, I connected the pedals to another computer and installed software
version 2.1.2, but the pedals still don't work.
I tried disconnecting the pedals from the hub, reinstalling different
versions of the software with the upgrade button enabled and disabled. The
result is always the same.


Also, one LED module on the left brake pedal has been malfunctioning from
the very beginning. It keeps working while the others are static.

The pedals were purchased on December 8, 2024 on Aliexpress.
Thank you and I hope for a quick response.

-- 
Kostiantyn Moskal

conversations.body_text: Hi Kostiantyn Moskal,     Please uninstall the old version of SIMSONN Manager from your PC and install the latest version, SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2.  If the software already shows “SIMSONN Flasher Mode,” the device is already in update mode. If not, press the upgrade button on the control box and reconnect the USB cable—the device will then enter update mode automatically.  Once in update mode, please update the firmware manually via: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-prox.sfu  After the firmware update is complete, set the Offset first, then recalibrate the pedals to finish the setup.
